article_title: Knee, Hip Surgery Costs Vary By $40,000 From Anchorage To Manhattan

article_metadata.description: The cost of hip and knee replacements varies by more than $20,000 across the country on average across the U.S., according to a new study that indicates the need for more price transparency for consumers in their ability to shop for health care services.
